title: FB Live 4/8: What to do if you feel guilty for wanting to lose weight
itunes:title: FB Live 4/8: What to do if you feel guilty for wanting to lose weight
description:
The other day a guy tried to get up my ass about, "Now's not the time time to lose weight. This is a pandemic. You should be ashamed."
 
OMG I got so pissed. AND, I'm HAPPY to be PISSED about this one.
 
Why?
 
1. He assumed women have nothing important tied to our weightloss. Like we can't lose weight to BE F-ING HEALTHIER or to show our kids we can be bored without a bag of chips.
 
2. I will NEVER be ashamed of telling a woman you can handle chaos without food. EVER.
 
I'm telling you right now.
 
You feeling guilty or ashamed because you are going to lose weight while handling all of this is WASTED emotional energy.
 
Listen to this important training so you can have a better way to think and feel about losing weight.
 
Get my Weightloss Free Course here:
http://phit.click/freecourse
